Table of Contents

Namespace Kekw.Interaction

Classes

AHapticBroker

Abstract base class, transmits haptic request to XrController component. Sub classes attach to same component as XRController that we want to control.

Activation

Activates not active gameobject when collision enters.

ButtonTop

Component sends haptic feedback when button bottom trigger is collided with.

ButtonTrigger

Ingame button base, collision detection against top part of button.

Coffee

Coffee pan behaviour. When coffee pan is picked up and detects mug it starts to play pouring VFX.

Destroyer

Destroy game objects if they hit fool or killplane. Detection happens with tags 'Floor' and 'KillPlane'.


This gameobject should also contain script that implements IDestroyable interface that handles actual destroying.

DisinfectionHolder

Hand sanitizer bottle thingy behaviour.

Instantiates vfx effect when button is pressed.

DrinkVending

Drink vending machine.

Machine uses drink pool that must be in scene in advance. Can only spawn one drink at the time.

Edible

Eatable item uses this component.

Eatabe items consists of multiple meshes some are full and some are "eaten". Component toggles between these meshes and finally destroys object if meshes end. Object is also destroyed if it hits the floor tag collider.

EdibleDestroyer

Destroys edible when it hits floor. Very similar to Destroyer.

EdibleType

Kinda edible what we are intetracting with.

HandActivation

Hand activation control. Provides event where state changes can be listened.

InfoDroplet

Info droplets tell player info about school.

IngameButton

Ingame button that works with slapping/pushing. Relies to IIngameButtonLogic.

InputMapInitializer

Disables bot interaction map at the beginning of the play.

KnobCorrect

Knobs hit this collider and when knob is detected sends signal to IMissionManager.

KnobsMissionManager

Make easter egg scene mission manager.

LeftHapticBroker

Left hand controller haptic broker.

Can be found by type in scene.

Mouth

Playable character mouth implementation. Plays correct sounds and vfx effect based on collider that hits mouth. Relies heavily to EdibleType.

Mug

Coffee mug. Can be filled and emptied.

RightHapticBroker

Right hand controller haptic broker.

Can be found by type in scene.

Rotate

Rotates make esteregg mission knobs.

Sprint

Character sprint ability. Character is able to sprint when sprint button is held.

TeleportTrigger

Detecs player entering to teleport area.

Vatupassi

Class measures angles when shit should be coming out of can or some other source.

VuoksiHoop

Vuoksi hoop ball detector.

Interfaces

IDestroyable

If object needs to be destroyed use this interface with Destroyer Destroyer Mug

IIngameButtonLogic

Ingame button target script will implement this interface.

Enums

EdibleTypes

Edibte type definations. Edibles consist of 2 types.

RotateArounxAxis

Enum representing axis in world.

Delegates

HandActivation.HandActiveAction

Event type

Made with docfx
